name: Pets by Proxy
description:
A game I made for this jam.

 There was no theme or anything, so I made a virtual pet/resource manager game.

The title is meaningless. I just used it because of its alliteration.

To be honest, I scuffed it quite a bit because I'm going through a busy period in my study. 

Here are a few things that I messed up:

  • I wanted to add a car that gave you a few choices for raising the pet's mood.
  • The UI placement is wrong.
  • I haven't added any sound effects.
  • There's a glitch where pop-up boxes will sometimes make you select an interactible item, causing the game to pause, which is pretty disorienting. I have no idea what causes this.

I think I did manage to achieve a balance and I think the game is pretty fun.
